name: Evolution
description: Evolution is an atmospheric arcade with elements of a runner performed in an interesting visual style, in which your task is to bring your little character to the end of each level, avoiding the many dangers that await him at every turn.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: intel core 2 duo Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel hd 4600 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i9 Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 1080ti DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 500 MB available space
